extendedInfo.description: Original price of $.99 for a limited time!Not ready to buy? Try out the ad-supported Phase Out Free!We are now releasing the beta version of our online multiplayer system! What does this mean? The game is fully functional and lets you play against 1-3 other players from anywhere in the world. It comes with built in social media integration, so you can challenge your Facebook friends and Twitter followers, or just invite players by their username or even strike up a match against a random opponent. While the program is in beta, each player is limited to only two concurrent games at a time, but this is only temporary and we hope to raise this limit soon. Also, if you find any bugs or have any suggestions about this initial release, please let us know! We want to provide the best possible experience, and your feedback is critical. Enjoy! ---------------------------------------------------------Introducing Phase Out, a social rummy-type card game for Android! Based on shanghai rummy, Phase Out features the fun-filled strategic gameplay popularized by other commercial rummy adaptations like Phase 10. Make your way through various stages, satisfying unique requirements for each stage to progress. Be the first player to complete all of their stages to phase out your opponents and become the winner!Features:-Full online play capability with up to 4 players!-Integrate with Facebook or Twitter to play your friends and followers!-Challenge the computer, or pass and play with your friends on one device-Choose from two preset game modes, or tweak the rules to create your own unique experience-Save your favorite game modes and easily replay them whenever you want-Need to take a break during a game? Save your game and pick up right where you left off later!Don't forget to rate and comment!---------------------------------------------------------Like us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/phaseoutgameand follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/#!/phaseoutgame---------------------------------------------------------Use of this game is governed by Phineus Media's Terms of Service:http://phineusmedia.wordpress.com/terms-of-serviceand the Privacy Policy linked below.

reviews.comment: No reviews given!
No reviews given!

reviews.title: Phase Out is Out of This Phase!!!
reviews.comment: I love Phase Out better than Phase 10! It gives me a chance to play against my friends and meet new people...
reviews.author: Renet Clines

reviews.title: From 5 star to 1
reviews.comment: I loved this app until I realized that if I get a call while playing, not only do I lose the entire game I\'ve been playing....  but all of my trophies/ achievements reset back to zero. You guys need to fix ASAP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great game.  Just wish they would make the cards played on the table a bit larger.  I am playing on a 10\" tablet and can barely see them.... and I have 20/20 vision.
reviews.author: Sherrie Allard

reviews.title: Abandoned by Devs?
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what happened but as of recently I can no longer play any of my online matches. I\'ve logged out then in again, deleted then reinstalled but still can\'t load my online matches. Plus I was never able to play 3 online games at once as advertised. No updates in almost a year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be better
reviews.comment: I think it would be better if u could see challenger\'s time zone. Sometimes you wait hours for a challenger to respond. Fun to play with friends and family though =)
reviews.author: Tynisha Boon

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I play with family n we play it all the time. We haven\'t had no problems with this game so far. N yes it was well worth the money to get this game. It\'s a lot fun. But it would be nice to get notices when it\'s ur turn tho.
reviews.author: Jennifer Panther

reviews.title: Please fix the notification issue
reviews.comment: It does not notify me when someone has finished their turn. Very frustrating because some people have quit playing against me because they thought I wasn\'t interested but the fact of the matter is that I didn\'t know they took their turn. Please fix the notification issue/s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cards dissapearing
reviews.comment: Playing 2 player w/ girlfriend and every time she would draw or double tap her cards would fly off to the right of the screen and disappear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only alows 2. Games
reviews.comment: Love this game but it only lets me have 2 games going at a time otherwise it be 5 stars
reviews.author: Aaron Dye

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: There seams to be glitches. I have to log out sometimes and log back in to take my turn. It also errors out and wont let me finish the game. I used to love the app but now there are too many issues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lots of fun!
reviews.comment: Just wish in custom mode it wouldn\'t give you the same phase two hands in a row.
reviews.author: Erin Manemann

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Like ability play online with others.   A little inconsistent in performance though.  But still good and fun.
reviews.author: Janet Owens

reviews.title: Addicted to this game
reviews.comment: I love the way that you can make up your own phases and save them.
reviews.author: Kelly Stubbs

reviews.title: Great game, now with online!
reviews.comment: Worth every penny. The developer has really captured the random streakiness, and infuriating skips, and inability to complete a hand. This game is really wonderful. Edit - I tried to play this on a plane and got an error about needing to verify my license after years of playing this game. What gives?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitches online play....
reviews.comment: Playing offline works fine but it ALWAYS force closes when I try to play random people or join existing games! Hoping this gete fixed soon since I paid the dollar for it!
reviews.author: Cynthia Silcott

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: Bought this game so I can have more than two games playing at one time and it won\'t let me start more than two games even though I only started one. Can you fix this please.
reviews.author: Justin Lebeau

reviews.title: Needs update!
reviews.comment: Very bad tech issues...won\'t let me play more than one game and it sent us back like 5 stages right In the middle of the game!
reviews.author: Joshua Scheidler

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Once I got used to the game play (the revolving table) it was fun. I like Phase 10 but it was too simple. I like how Phase Out has customizable phases and I like the Special mode too. Enough variety and challenge to keep me interested. Glad I bought it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I love this game. I would give it five stars if there was a way to put a time limit on a person\'s turn. I have been waiting for my opponents to play for weeks now. I would also like it if the game could have \"it\'s your turn\" notifications sent to the players through their devices, and finally it.would be nice to select facebook friends to play with.
reviews.author: Emma Stovall
